price: Aba’y hindi! Tunay na ang talaan ng mga mabuting-loob ay talagang nasa `Illīyūn.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
